    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    HtmlTag
    HtmlTag.addClass(String className)
    Adds a CSS class to this tag.
    HtmlTag
    HtmlTag.addStyle(String property, String value)
    Adds or updates a CSS property in the style attribute.
    HtmlTag
    HtmlTag.withAttribute(String name, String value)
    Adds an HTML attribute to this tag.
    HtmlTag
    HtmlTag.withChild(Component component)
    Adds a child component to this tag.
    HtmlTag
    HtmlTag.withClass(String className)
    Alias for HtmlTag.addClass(String).
    HtmlTag
    HtmlTag.withInnerText(SlotKey<String> slotKey)
    Sets a slot key for dynamic inner text content.
    HtmlTag
    HtmlTag.withInnerText(String text)
    Sets the simple text content for this tag.
    HtmlTag
    HtmlTag.withMaxWidth(String maxWidth)
    Sets the maximum width of this element using CSS.
    HtmlTag
    HtmlTag.withMinWidth(String minWidth)
    Sets the minimum width of this element using CSS.
    HtmlTag
    HtmlTag.withUnsafeHtml(String html)
    Sets inner HTML content that will be rendered WITHOUT HTML escaping.
    HtmlTag
    HtmlTag.withWidth(String width)
    Sets the width of this element using CSS.
